item.title: Ep. 91: Luke Moon - The Current and Future State of Israel [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description: For over 6 months, conflict has ravaged the Middle East. It seems it wasn't enough for Israel to fight one enemy, but recently Iran launched 800 missiles at them, furthering the chaos and destruction in Israel. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by Luke Moon, executive director of the Philos Project, for a conversation surrounding the current and future state of Israel. Starting from the beginning, Luke and Joseph analyze the Biden administration's shifting support of Israel and the constant public call for a ceasefire. For decades, there has been a strange and irrational hatred toward Jewish people, the worldwide scapegoat. In this war, there is one clear victim: Israel. Listen now for a current update on the war and an estimate of how long this conflict will last.

item.title: TCND: Naming It and Claiming It...and CAKE! (Bi-Weekly???) [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description:
First, let's talk about making cake for no reason... And,we need a short word-study, because the word "bi-weekly" has too many definitions.

Next:  John has been watching lots of videos of sermons from Charismatic preachers.  This false doctrine happens to be the very first theological question that Luke and the Peaches tackled before they got married!

Later:  A friend of John's almost made him choke on his chicken caesar salad.  What sort of "authority" are Christians "supposed" to have when it comes to raising the dead?

Finally: Luke wants to know, "Is believing a false Gospel the same as not being a Christian at all?"  How much truth about Jesus do you need in order to be saved?

Email the Comedian's family at nextdoor@johnbranyan.com

item.title: Men & Social Status, Women & College Debt, Hypergamy, and More! [The Pugcast]
item.description:
Today Chris takes the Pugs into the dark recesses of social status and asks questions few are willing to ask. For example: Why do so many women who apply to rent Chris's apartments have so much student loan debt, and such low credit scores? Why do young men in the trades with no debt and good income still lose out to flashy guys with tons of debt who flash shiny objects? And, can contemporary culture change its ways of measuring worth to reflect reality and not the image-generated fantasies of people on the make in higher education, corporate America, and left-wing ideologues? Tune in for these questions and many more!

 

Leon Podles on the Aaron Renn Show Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/leon-podles-the-deep-roots-of-mens-alienation-from-church/id1530654244?i=1000651785160

 

Leon Podles Interview Transcript on Aaron’s Substack: https://www.aaronrenn.com/p/leon-podles-the-deep-roots-of-mens?utm_source=profile&utm_medium=reader2

 

Support the Pugcast in Oxford on Indiegogo: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-pugcast-goes-to-oxford/x/6893861#/

 

Support the Pugcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thetheologypugcast?fbclid=IwAR17UHhfzjphO52C_kkZfursA_C784t0ldFix0wyB4fd-YOJpmOQ3dyqGf8

 

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/

item.title: What Does “Disciple the Nations” Mean for Law and Politics? [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: God promised “nations” would come from Abraham and Jesus told his disciples to disciple the nations. With that in mind, David uses scripture and some observations from Choc Knox and Jason Farley (Knox Unplugged) to explain how this kind of “nation building” is influencing the focus of his work in law and politics.

item.title: Ep. 90: Surrogacy - A Moral Argument with Katy Faust [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description: Children are not something to be purchased. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by Katy Faust, founder of Them Before Us for a moral discussion on the topic of surrogacy. Unlike adoption, there are few regulations in the world of surrogacy. Katy explains the dynamic and effects that all three types of mothers have on the child, surrogacy tourism, and the Uniformed Parentage Act. Public policy is being shaped to the interest of adults and to the detriment of children. There is no surrogacy situation where the child comes out ahead. Listen now to learn the moral argument against surrogacy.
item.author: Joseph Backholm

item.title: 151: Relationships: Parents & Children [Leadership Now Podcast]
item.description:
In this episode, Aaron holds nothing back in his advice on what a healthy parent-child relationship should look like. Everything from discipline, household culture, speaking into your children's lives, all the way to how to act when your children have children of their own is covered in this episode of Leadership Now with Dr. Aaron Rock.

item.title: ELECTION INTERFERENCE IS BAD...Unless it is By Your Chinese Friends, Of Course & the Trans-Cult is Argument is DESTROYED by Science [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ April 18, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew take a look at the recent inquiry into CCP election interference in Canada's 2019 and 2021 general elections. While the Liberals were warned a multiplicity of times by CSIS, the Trudeau Regime did nothing and said nothing, and our Prime Minister couldn't even be bothered to read the briefings. Oh, and the guys show how every longitudinal piece of scientific data and all common sense flies in the face of the healthfulness of disfiguring human beings for the sake of a delusion. Yet, the RAINBOW CULT MAFIA presses forward with the help of our insane government. 

[Segment 1] - CCP Election Interference:
"Trudeau Briefed on Alleged Interference Dong Riding Document" | Global News https://globalnews.ca/news/10410957/trudeau-briefed-alleged-interference-dong-riding-document;
"China Interfered in 2019, 2021 Canadian Federal Elections: Canadian Security Intelligence Service" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/china-interfered-in-2019-2021-canadian-federal-elections-canadian-security-intelligence-service?utm_content=;
"CSIS Briefing for PMO in 2023 Says China Interfered in Both 2019 and 2021 Federal Elections" | The Globe and Mail https://www.theglobeandmail.com/politics/article-csis-briefing-for-pmo-in-2023-says-china-interfered-in-both-2019-and;
"Key Takeaways: Election Interference Inquiry" | TNC News https://tnc.news/2024/04/15/key-takeaways-election-interference-inquiry;

[Segment 2] - Trans Insanity Presses on Despite Being Overwhelmingly DEBUNKED:
"Children Socially Transition Face Grave Psychological Risks" | The Telegraph https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2024/04/06/children-socially-transition-face-grave-psychological-risks;
"Final Report: Independent Review of Children’s Social Care" | Cass Independent Review https://cass.independent-review.uk/home/publications/final-report;
"Woke British Columbia Teacher Claims She Is in Danger After Being Exposed for Indoctrinating Students in Gender Ideology" | The Post Millennial https://thepostmillennial.com/woke-british-columbia-teacher-claims-she-is-in-danger-after-being-exposed-for-indoctrinating-students-in-gender-ideology?utm_content=;
"Levy: Government Funded Opposing Gender Ideology" | TNC News https://tnc.news/2024/04/09/levy-government-funded-opposing-gender-ideology;

[Segment 3] - Interview w/Greg Lawrie from Pro Fleet Care

item.title: Will Spencer: The Renaissance of Men is Now! [Dead Men Walking Podcast]
item.description: This week Greg sat down with Will Spencer. Will is the host of The Renaissance of Men Podcast. They discussed what biblical masculinity looks like, the "Manosphere", why the secular society seems to hate masculinity, and the nuances between the waves in feminism, why it's not sustainable or biblical, and why Pastors need to start correcting women and not just men from the pulpit. Enjoy!

item.title: Does the Bible Condone Slavery? - Part II: Choose Ye this Day, Slavery or Liberty in Christ? [The Ezra Institute Podcast for Cultural Reformation]
item.description:
In this third episode of our new series, Conversations & Presuppositions, Doctors Boot and Thiessen revisit their conversation on slavery and the Bible by examining why Christianity is the only worldview that can consistently lead to liberty and how a culture's rejection of Christ naturally leads to slavery. Choose ye this day, dear listener, freedom in Christ or slavery to sin and death?

Episode Resources:
Sam Harris on Ben Shapiro's Sunday Special | Daily Wire: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gTJTD8vzBoo;

For Ezra's many print resources and to join our newsletter, visit: https://ezrapress.com

Stay up-to-date with all things Ezra Institute:https://www.ezrainstitute.com
Subscribe to Ezra's YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPVvQDHHrOOjziyqUaN9VoA?sub_confirmation=1;

item.title: LD NEWS BRIEF: 04/16/2024 [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch: NEWS BRIEF ~ April 16, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch NEWS BRIEF, host Andrew DeBartolo breaks down Canadian news, culture, and politics from a distinctly Christian, Conservative, and Canadian perspective.

Episode Resources:
"Massive Cancer Deaths Study Vindicates My Warnings Over COVID Boosters" | The Conservative Woman https://www.conservativewoman.co.uk/massive-cancer-deaths-study-vindicates-my-warnings-over-covid-boosters;
"Dr. Scott Atlas on Why We Were Forced to Jab and Mask" | PragerU https://www.prageru.com/video/dr-scott-atlas-on-why-we-were-forced-to-jab-and-mask;
"Trudeau Gov't Still Receiving COVID Shots While Throwing Away $1.5 Billion Worth of Expired Jabs" | LifeSiteNews https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/trudeau-govt-still-receiving-covid-shots-while-throwing-away-1-5-billion-worth-of-expired-jabs;
"New Papers Completely Undermine the So-Called Settled Science on Manmade Global Warming" | The Epoch Times https://www.theepochtimes.com/epochtv/new-papers-completely-undermine-the-so-called-settled-science-on-manmade-global-warming-alex-newman-5512688;
"Research Article: Estimating the Benefits of Climate Policy Using the Weather Research and Forecasting Model" | American Meteorological Society https://journals.ametsoc.org/view/journals/apme/62/8/JAMC-D-22-0122.1.xml;
"Research Article: Ongoing Impact of COVID-19 Pandemic on Global Food Security" | IOP Science https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1674-4527/acf18e;
"Research Article: National Assessment of the COVID-19 Response of Bangladesh, Ethiopia, Myanmar, Nigeria, Tanzania, and Vietnam" | MDPI https://www.mdpi.com/2225-1154/11/9/179;
"PBO: 1.3 Million Homes by 2030" | TNC News https://tnc.news/2024/04/13/pbo-1-3-million-homes-2030;
"Quadriplegic Man Chose MAID" | TNC News https://tnc.news/2024/04/14/quadriplegic-man-chose-maid;
"It's the End of the World, and the Church Is Doing Just Fine" | Western Standard https://www.westernstandard.news/opinion/parker-its-the-end-of-the-world-and-the-church-is-doing-just-fine/53796;

item.title: Ep. 89: Abortion and the Changing Political Landscape [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description: As the 2024 presidential election draws nearer, one topic has taken over many a politician’s speech: abortion. Since the overturn of Roe v. Wade, there has been debate on the future of America and its stance on the life issue. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by Family Research Council’s Quena Gonzalez to weigh in on the current culture surrounding abortion and where he sees America heading. Touching on former president Donald Trump’s abortion comments, Quena encourages listeners to continue fighting for life and offers a unique perspective on what it is like to be a Christian in politics. Take heart pro-lifers, the work is not yet done!

item.title: TCND: Should You Change Careers? (Disc Golf and Oil-Changes) [The Comedian Next Door]
item.description:
Well, Neighbor, it has been TOO LONG since we talked about disc golf!  Go get yourself some discs, so you don't have to be left out of the recurring conversation. 

Next:  We're going to answer all your questions about how to schedule your time...  No, wait, we're going to tell you whether or not to quit your job.   No, actually we're going to talk about productivity. 

Luke feels guilty because he doesn't think he's bringing enough focus to his day job.  How should bosses and employees measure "productivity?"  (And what kind of "productivity" really brings the most value to the people you love?)

There are so many different directions we could take this conversation! But, of course, it always comes back to home-education and family life.  

Contact the Comedian's family by emailing nextdoor@johnbranyan.com .

item.title: Creation, Theophany, and Transcendence [The Pugcast]
item.description:
Today’s show builds on the conversation about imagination and C. S. Lewis last week. Tom and the guys continue the interaction with Lewis’ rich sacramental vision and its implications for how our human created natures are enriched and helped to come into their own principally by the vertical, our relation to God, but secondarily by the good gift of others that God has supplied for us to transcend and yet become ourselves in the rich fabric of created reality. Listen in!

 

 

Support the Pugcast in Oxford on Indiegogo: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-pugcast-goes-to-oxford/x/6893861#/

 

Support the Pugcast on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thetheologypugcast?fbclid=IwAR17UHhfzjphO52C_kkZfursA_C784t0ldFix0wyB4fd-YOJpmOQ3dyqGf8

 

The Theology Pugcast is a ministry of Trinity Reformed Church in Huntsville Alabama. To view more media from TRC, visit their website: https://trinityreformedkirk.com/trc-media/

item.title: Ep. 88: Solar Eclipse - Doomsday or Intentional Design? [The Outstanding Podcast]
item.description:
On April 8th, 2024, a total eclipse graced a portion of the North American skies, completely blocking out the sun for 4 minutes and 28 seconds. Many gazed up at the sun (with their solar eclipse-approved sunglasses of course) with awe and wonder, but a surprising number of people were fearful, believing this scientific phenomenon to be a sign of the end of the world. Host Joseph Backholm is joined by Jay Richards, co-author of The Privileged Planet, for an honest discussion of the meaning of an eclipse and how to think biblically about it. A long-time eclipse tracker, Jay shares his knowledge of what causes an eclipse and how this unique solar experience is evidence of an intentional Creator. Order never comes from chaos without intelligence, join us for evidence and education on solar eclipses.

Read ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠The Washington Stand⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠, featuring news and commentary from a biblical worldview. Published by ⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠Family Research Council⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠⁠.

item.itunes:author: Dr. Aaron Rock, Chris Eelman

item.title: Nation Saving or Nation Building? [God, Law, and Liberty]
item.description: Many Christians, including preachers, politicians, and policy organizations, seem bent on “saving” America from further ruin by various means. Is that really the purpose for which the mystery of God was revealed in the person of Christ? Does the covenant with Abraham, illuminated by the new covenant in Christ, suggest a national purpose relative to law and civil government that Christians have not considered? And what kind of politicians and policy makers (and preachers) would we need, given our present ones seem to have failed us. Join David as he works through these questions.

item.title: Trouble in Scotland (New & Old) [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ April 11, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew cover new highly concerning legislation passed in Nova Scotia and Scotland that sets a dangerous precedent for law in the Western world. The guys are also joined by their friend, pastor, and Chief Freedom Fuel Officer at Resistance Coffee, Alex Kloosterman, to talk about taking dominion for the glory of God through entrepreneurship.

[Segment 1] - NOVA SCOTIA (New Scotland) passes the Financial Measures Act (07:32-24:56):
Nova Scotia Passes Financial Measures Act | Canadian Independent https://twitter.com/canindependent/status/1777372986846122279;
"Bill B419 - 1st Reading" | Nova Scotia Legislature https://nslegislature.ca/legc/bills/64th_1st/1st_read/b419.htm;
"Financial Measures 2022 Act Introduced" | Government of Nova Scotia https://news.novascotia.ca/en/2022/04/08/financial-measures-2022-act-introduced;
"Controversial Law: Government Access to Medical Records" | TNC News https://tnc.news/2024/04/10/controversial-law-government-access-medical-records;

[Segment 2] - SCOTLAND (Old Scotland) passes hate crime laws (26:00-41:05):
"Act of the Scottish Parliament" | Legislation.gov.uk: https://www.legislation.gov.uk/asp/2021/14/contents;
"JK Rowling Will Not Be Arrested Under New Scottish Hate Law, Say Police" | The Guardianhttps://www.theguardian.com/politics/2024/apr/02/jk-rowling-will-not-be-arrested-under-new-scottish-hate-law-say-police;
"Scotland's New Hate Crime Law" | The New York Timeshttps://www.nytimes.com/2024/04/01/world/europe/scotland-hate-crime-law.html;

[Segment 3] - Interview w/Alex Kloosterman (42:13-END)
